Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition HepBAdultForecastingPD

url: PlanDefinition Immunization Forecasting of Hepatitis B Vaccine for Adults >= 18 Years of Age

identifier: HepBAdultForecastingPD (use: official, )

version: 1.0.0

name: HepBAdultForecastingPD

title: Immunization Forecasting of Hepatitis B Vaccine for Adults >= 18 Years of Age

type: ECA Rule

status: Draft

experimental: true

date: 2024-11-18 18:29:28+0000

publisher: HL7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG

contact: HL7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG: http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/dss/index.cfm

description:

If an adult patient has not been immunized for Hep B and is indicated for a Hep B vaccine, providers should administer according to this forecast.

UseContexts

-CodeValue[x]
*UsageContextType focus: Clinical FocusImmunization/vaccination management (procedure)

jurisdiction: World

purpose:

Example artifact implementation of CDC ACIP Hep B vaccination guidelines for adults, 18 years and older, who have not yet been immunized.

topic: Immunization Forecasting

author: Daryl Chertcoff: , Bryn Rhodes:
